bibl.title: Greetings from Alexandria.
bibl.note: Investigates the greeting formulae in the Zenon Archive.

bibl.title: Proceedings of the 24th International Congress of Papyrology, Helsinki, 1-7 August, 2004. Volume I

bibl.seg: EVANS Trevor V., Greetings from Alexandria.

Jaakko FRÖSÉN, Tiina PUROLA and Erja SALMENKIVI (Edd.), Proceedings of the 24th International Congress of Papyrology, Helsinki, 1-7 August, 2004. Volume I = Commentationes Humanarum Litterarum. 122, 1, 2007 (Helsinki, 2007) pp. 299-308.
Investigates the greeting formulae in the Zenon Archive.
